# argmin()

**Instance Method**

Returns the index of the element with the lowest value.

## Declaration

```swift
func argmin() -> Base.Index?
```

```swift
func argmin() -> FilledColumn<Base>.Index?
```

## Finding an Element Index

- **argmax()**: Returns the index of the element with the highest value.
